data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yamamoto, Shûhei, Maruyama, Munetoshi (2016): Revision of the subgenus Aleochara Gravenhorst of the parasitoid rove beetle genus Aleochara Gravenhorst of Japan (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae). Zootaxa 4101 (1): 1-68, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4101.1.1
